BattleEffectText.Name: Geon
BattleEffectText.Desc: Gain 1 Strength, and deal 3 more damage and Stagger damage with attacks this Scene.

BattleEffectText.Name: Gon
BattleEffectText.Desc: Gain 2 Endurance, and take 30% less damage and Stagger damage from attacks this Scene.

BattleEffectText.Name: Gam
BattleEffectText.Desc: Restore 1 Light. If full Light, then recover 1 Light of other allies with lowest Light.

BattleEffectText.Name: Ri
BattleEffectText.Desc: Draw 1 page. Reduce the cost of drawed page by 1 (Reset when use)

BattleEffectText.Name: Hexagram Page
BattleEffectText.Desc: Play on slotted Speed Dice to apply extra ability to the slotted page. Incompatible with EGO, Mass Attack or Passive-related pages.

BattleEffectText.Name: [Full Trigrams] "Geon" Used
BattleEffectText.Desc: Play following Trigram Pages to gain pages that apply respective enhancement to slotted pages: "Gon": Pǐ (The page has a chance to be played again) "Gam": Sòng (The page's [On Use] effect trigger twice when played) "Ri": Tóng Rén (Dice of the page gain Power for every other copy used)

BattleEffectText.Name: [Full Trigrams] "Gon" Used
BattleEffectText.Desc: Play following Trigram Pages to gain pages that apply respective enhancement to slotted pages: "Geon": Tài (Keeping the page in hand increase Damage dealt in this Scene) "Gam": Shī (Keeping the page in hand trigger its [On Use] effect on random enemy) "Ri": Míng Yí (Keeping the page in hand permantly boost all dice of its copies)

BattleEffectText.Name: [Full Trigrams] "Gam" Used
BattleEffectText.Desc: Play following Trigram Pages to gain pages that apply respective enhancement to slotted pages: "Geon": Xū (Upgrad the page to deal extra Stagger Damage by using other Pages that cost more) "Gon": Bǐ (Upgrad the page to gain a shield to absorb Stagger Damage by using other Pages that cost more) "Ri": Jì Jì (Permantly reduce the page's cost by using other Pages that cost more)

BattleEffectText.Name: [Full Trigrams] "Ri" Used
BattleEffectText.Desc: Play following Trigram Pages to gain pages that apply respective enhancement to slotted pages: "Geon": Dà Yǒu (If the page is played on the Scene it is drawn, boost all dice's Power) "Gon": Jìn (If the page is played on the Scene it is drawn, gain Couter version of the page) "Gam": Wèi Jì (If the page is played on the Scene it is drawn, draw this page on the next Scene)

BattleEffectText.Name: Pǐ
BattleEffectText.Desc: After using the page, reuse the page against a random enemy at 50% chance. (Once per Scene)

BattleEffectText.Name: Sòng
BattleEffectText.Desc: The page's [On Use] effect trigger twice (Once per Scene)

BattleEffectText.Name: Tóng Rén
BattleEffectText.Desc: [On Use] For each other copy of the page played this Scene by the character, all dice of the page gain +2 Power

BattleEffectText.Name: Tài
BattleEffectText.Desc: [Combat Start] If this page remain in hand, discard this page to boost your Damage dealt in this Scene by +35%

BattleEffectText.Name: Shī
BattleEffectText.Desc: [Combat Start] If this page remain in hand, discard this page to trigger its [On Use] effect on random enemy

BattleEffectText.Name: Míng Yí
BattleEffectText.Desc: [Combat Start] If this page remain in hand, discard this page to permantly uplift all dice of its copies by 1

BattleEffectText.Name: Xū
BattleEffectText.Desc: When using Pages with cost larger than the cost of this Page, gain 1 stack of "Xū" [On Use] Based on Xū's stack, inflict {0} Stagger Damage per stack to target. Reset all stacks after use

BattleEffectText.Name: Bǐ
BattleEffectText.Desc: When using Pages with cost larger than the cost of this Page, gain 1 stack of "Bǐ" [On Use] Based on Bǐ's stack, gain shield that can absorb {0} Stagger Damage per stack. Reset all stacks after use

BattleEffectText.Name: Stagger Sheild
BattleEffectText.Desc: Can absorb {0} Stagger Damage

BattleEffectText.Name: Jì Jì
BattleEffectText.Desc: When using Pages with more than {0} cost while this page is in hand, permantly reduce the cost of this page by 1

BattleEffectText.Name: Dà Yǒu
BattleEffectText.Desc: [On Use] All dice gain +2 Power [Combat Start] If this page remain in hand, temporarily disable this effect until this Page return to hand again

BattleEffectText.Name: Jìn
BattleEffectText.Desc: [Combat Start] Retain copies of all dice as Counter dice; If this page remain in hand, temporarily disable this effect until this Page return to hand again

BattleEffectText.Name: Wèi Jì
BattleEffectText.Desc: [On Use] Draw this page at the start of next Scene [Combat Start] If this page remain in hand, temporarily disable this effect until this Page return to hand again

BattleEffectText.Name: Bonus Effect
BattleEffectText.Desc: Geon - 'Combat Start: All dice of the character gain +1 Power this Scene' Gon - 'Combat Start: All allies gain 3 Protection and Stagger Protection'.

BattleEffectText.Name: Bonus Effect
BattleEffectText.Desc: Gam - 'Combat Start: Reduce Cost of all pages by 1 for the next Scene' Ri - 'Combat Start: Draw 3 pages'

BattleEffectText.Name: Bonus Effect
BattleEffectText.Desc: Geon - 'Recycle all dice on this page (Up to 1 times)' Gon - 'Recover 30% Max HP and all Stagger Resist'.

BattleEffectText.Name: Bonus Effect
BattleEffectText.Desc: Gam - 'All allies recover 2 Light' Ri - 'Draw 3 pages at the start of next Scene'
